game_description: Please join our discord server and meet players: https://discord.gg/pCgr6rgraY - Update #2 available! new map, new weapons, more languages and voice overs ! DOGFIGHT! Take the role of a newly enlisted pilot in the deadliest squad in the Ansharian arsenal. Bring the fight to the Nergal in dazzling ship-to-ship battles in deep space and lush planetary surfaces. Freely traverse large planet surfaces, dodge space debris and asteroid fields by steering your ship using your hands, in third or first person view. Fly a variety of ships across 13 missions single player campaign. Engage other players in a space Battle Royale, in a Deathmatch arena or in a co-op mission. Level up to unlock various cosmetic skins for your ship, helmet of controllers.
review_1: This game is a must have. The graphic is simple, but nicely done, so I like it because I came from the old school. The game is very fluid. Just an improvement should change the height of the player, so a person can play in first person sitting on a swing chair. I think that can give a better immersion.
review_2: It doesn’t let me play multiplayer but I’m seeing all the good reviews so I’m missing something
review_3: Ok this game was my first purchase that kept me coming back day after day. Granted I also wish the game had more levels, but other than that I have no complaints it was money well spent and I've played many busts I had high hopes for i.e Medal of Honor, any Mech game, any football game👎, Vader Immortal 👎, Iron Man 👎 etc. My only hope is that there is a sequel coming. This WW1 Airplanes, and In Death Unchained and my top 3 of the 90+ games I own.
